title: Scalpmaster Ceramic Thermal Hair Straightener, Red
description: This high quality, ergonomic red ceramic thermal hair straightener from Scalpmaster is specially developed for professional hair styling and lasting durability.

title: Avlon Styling Wax, 2.6 Ounce
description: Helps detail styles. Enhances wispy and spiky style. It creates texture. Details styles. Gives flexible hold.

title: Dream Deluxe Multi Use Weaving Cap Black #0157
Hicks Edges 4oz
description: Hicks Total TRANSFORMATIONS, Hicks Edges holds hair firmly in place with a super shine and without flakiness. Leaves edges looking and feeling shinier and healthier than before. This genuine hair gel is non-flaky and non-sticky and rinses out easily. Control tapered cuts and nape back area. Directions: Apply a small amount of TRANSFORMATIONS Smooth Edges around edges and smooth with fingertips until hair stays in place or comb in smooth with a comb

title: Model in a Bottle Model In a Bottle Long Lasting Eyebrow Sealer
description: Eyebrows give expression to your eyes and frame your face. Now with Model in a Bottle Long Lasting Eyebrow Sealer, you can be confident that your brows will stay in place all day.
